questions.question: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

answers.answer: Yesterday, I went to a concert ! It was very original because there were not any intruments. It's weird, no?

Indeed, there were not intruments because the science was in the place. Four persons made music with domestic things. But what ? For exemple, one of this people made music with a glass of water. Another people played with a lot of boils to replace the drum.
It was very original and magic. The science is able to replace different instruments and products different sounds. So, I have one advice for you... Try a science concert !
